Dear sir or madam,

According to the information from the web and social platform, there will be a peaceful assembly outside your office (Consulate General of the US) at Hong Kong time 14:00 on 8th September,2016 (this Sunday) in which a petition for the urge of the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act will be expressed and a letter is hoped to be passed to your officer.

1. Full withdrawal of the extradition bill

FIVE DEMANDS,

REVOLUTION OF OUR TIMES.
